GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.19.8
GSD.description:
ieee802154/adf7242: defer destroy_workqueue call

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit 15f3b89bd521d5770d36a61fc04a77c293138ba6, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit 58e9683d14752debc6f22daf6b23e031787df31f. For more details please see the references link.
